overview: Maurice Martin founded iRise on an early prediction of Java acceptance and Internet growth in 1996. In addition to his business management role, he shapes the iRise Application Simulator vision and guides the product roadmap. He gained his business and technology experience during tenures at Deloitte Consulting and Accenture, working with clients such as Capital Group, Kaiser Permanente and Southern California Gas Company prior to founding iRise. Maurice earned a B.S. in electrical engineering from the University of California at Santa Barbara.

degrees.subject: Electrical Engineering
degrees.institution: University of California at Santa Barbara
